item.title: Polly Holliday, Who Played Flo on ‘Alice,’ Dies at 88
item.description: Polly Holliday, a prolific stage and screen actress known for playing the gum-smacking waitress Flo who popularized the phrase “Kiss my grits!” on the long-running CBS sitcom “Alice,
